comments.creator: sprior@mozilla.com
comments.author: sprior@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Hi Rainer - As we talked about we would like to film a talking head video of Mitchell so she can introduce the State of Mozilla website. 

There are probably some other things we can do in the video as well to make it cool, but at the very least we need some footage of Mitchell talking. 

She is available next Wednesday, August 24 at 3pm. Can we film then?
comments.raw_text:
Hi Rainer - As we talked about we would like to film a talking head video of Mitchell so she can introduce the State of Mozilla website. 

There are probably some other things we can do in the video as well to make it cool, but at the very least we need some footage of Mitchell talking. 

She is available next Wednesday, August 24 at 3pm. Can we film then?
